snippet.title: ArsonVille | PC Gameplay
snippet.description:
ArsonVille | Ludum Dare Gameplay

Game Description: Can you destroy the whole village? 

You're armed with a small set of fire proliferating goodies, and only ONE chance to start the fire. 

Created by: Graham Weldon 

Download link: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-36/?action=preview&uid=5709

Make sure you Like, Comment and Subscribe!

Want more Splazer?
